name: It's a Mystery Picture Game!
description:
I used to play this game with the students of my comics class. It was a fun way to pass time as students were arriving and a nice way to end the day too. If you're teaching a class, I think this game may be a good fit to add to your collection of ice breakers and end-of-day activities. If you're not teaching a class, I hope that this is a fun game to play with your friends or by yourself.

 Thank you!
